016package io.micronaut.maven.openapi;
017
018import io.micronaut.openapi.generator.MicronautCodeGeneratorBuilder;
019import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.LifecyclePhase;
020import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Mojo;
021import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Parameter;
022
023/**
024 * Generates an OpenAPI server.
025 * The sources are generated in the target directory.
026 */
027@Mojo(name = OpenApiServerMojo.MOJO_NAME, defaultPhase = LifecyclePhase.GENERATE_SOURCES)
028public class OpenApiServerMojo extends AbstractOpenApiMojo {
029    public static final String MOJO_NAME = "generate-openapi-server";
030    private static final String SERVER_PREFIX = MICRONAUT_OPENAPI_PREFIX + ".server.";
031
032    /**
033     * The package name of the controller if controller implementation files are generated.
034     */
035    @Parameter(property = SERVER_PREFIX + "controller.package.name", defaultValue = IO_MICRONAUT_OPENAPI_PREFIX + ".controller.package.name", required = true)
036    protected String controllerPackageName;
037
038    /**
039     * Whether to generate authentication annotations for APIs.
040     */
041    @Parameter(property = SERVER_PREFIX + "use.auth", defaultValue = "false")
042    protected boolean useAuth;
043
044    /**
045     * Determines if the server should use lombok.
046     * @since 4.2.2
047     */
048    @Parameter(property = SERVER_PREFIX + "lombok")
049    protected boolean lombok;
050
051    /**
052     * Determines if the server should use flux for arrays.
053     * @since 4.2.2
054     */
055    @Parameter(property = SERVER_PREFIX + "flux.for.arrays")
056    protected boolean fluxForArrays;
057
058    /**
059     * If set to true, the `javax.annotation.Generated` annotation will be added to all generated classes.
060     * @since 4.2.2
061     */
062    @Parameter(property = SERVER_PREFIX + "generated.annotation", defaultValue = "true")
063    protected boolean generatedAnnotation;
064
065    /**
066     * If set to true, the generated code should be made compatible with Micronaut AOT.
067     * @since 4.2.2
068     */
069    @Parameter(property = SERVER_PREFIX + "aot.compatible")
070    protected boolean aotCompatible;
071
072    /**
073     * The property that defines if this mojo should be used in configuration.
074     */
075    @Parameter(property = MICRONAUT_OPENAPI_PREFIX + ".generate.server")
076    protected boolean enabled;
077
078    @Override
079    protected boolean isEnabled() {
080        return enabled;
081    }
082
083    @Override
084    protected void configureBuilder(MicronautCodeGeneratorBuilder builder) {
085        if ("java".equalsIgnoreCase(lang)) {
086            builder.forJavaServer(spec -> {
087                spec.withControllerPackage(controllerPackageName);
088                spec.withAuthentication(useAuth);
089                // we don't want these to be configurable in the plugin for now
090                spec.withGenerateImplementationFiles(false);
091                spec.withGenerateControllerFromExamples(false);
092                spec.withGenerateOperationsToReturnNotImplemented(false);
093                spec.withLombok(lombok);
094                spec.withFluxForArrays(fluxForArrays);
095                spec.withGeneratedAnnotation(generatedAnnotation);
096                spec.withAot(aotCompatible);
097            });
098        } else if ("kotlin".equalsIgnoreCase(lang)) {
099            builder.forKotlinServer(spec -> {
100                spec.withControllerPackage(controllerPackageName);
101                spec.withAuthentication(useAuth);
102                // we don't want these to be configurable in the plugin for now
103                spec.withGenerateImplementationFiles(false);
104                spec.withGenerateControllerFromExamples(false);
105                spec.withGenerateOperationsToReturnNotImplemented(false);
106                spec.withFluxForArrays(fluxForArrays);
107                spec.withGeneratedAnnotation(generatedAnnotation);
108                spec.withAot(aotCompatible);
109            });
110        } else {
111            throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Unsupported language: " + lang);
112        }
113    }
114}
